original_text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves, that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets.
korean_text: 그러면 너희가 선지자를 죽인 자의 자손임을 스스로 증명함이로다

sentences.original_text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 너희 자신에게 증인이 되나니

sentences.original_text: that ye are the children of them
